mapper.select: select if(gender = 1, '男', '女') as gender, count(*) as total from emp group by gender order by total

select (case when job = 1 then '教研主管' when job = 2 then '学工主管' when job = 3 then '班主任' when job = 4 then '咨询师' when job = 5 then '讲师' end) as jobName, count(*) as total from emp group by job order by total

select (case when degree = 1 then '初中' when degree = 2 then '高中' when degree = 3 then '大专' when degree = 4 then '本科' when degree = 5 then '硕士' end ) as name, count(*) as value from student group by degree order by value

select ( case when clazz.id = 1 then 'Java' when clazz.id = 2 then 'SringBoot' when clazz.id = 3 then 'Python' when clazz.id = 4 then 'Swift' end ) as name, count(*) as value from student, clazz where student.clazz_id = clazz.id group by clazz.id
